jde.wizards
Class DelegateFactory

java.lang.Object
  jde.wizards.MethodFactory
      jde.wizards.DelegateFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClassRegistry
public class DelegateFactory
extends MethodFactory

Defines a factory for generating methods that delegate tasks to be performed by an instance of one class (the delegator) to an instance of another class (the delegee. The delegator must have a field that references the delegee.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $
Author:
Charles Hart, Eric D. Friedman, and Paul Kinnucan
